OpeWinSettings.Name: Left
OpeWinSettings.ScriptBody: if GetCount() == 0 then MoveTo(0, 0) ResizeTo(1/2, 1) elsif GetCount() == 1 then MoveTo(0, 0) ResizeTo(1/3, 1) elsif GetCount() == 2 then MoveTo(0, 0) ResizeTo(2/3, 1) ResetCount() endif

OpeWinSettings.Name: Right
OpeWinSettings.ScriptBody: if GetCount() == 0 then MoveTo(1/2, 0) ResizeTo(1/2, 1) elsif GetCount() == 1 then MoveTo(1 - 1/3, 0) ResizeTo(1/3, 1) elsif GetCount() == 2 then MoveTo(1 - 2/3, 0) ResizeTo(2/3, 1) ResetCount() endif

OpeWinSettings.Name: Up
OpeWinSettings.ScriptBody: if GetCount() == 0 then MoveTo(0, 0) ResizeTo(1, 1/2) elsif GetCount() == 1 then MoveTo(0, 0) ResizeTo(1, 1/3) elsif GetCount() == 2 then MoveTo(0, 0) ResizeTo(1, 2/3) ResetCount() endif

OpeWinSettings.Name: Down
OpeWinSettings.ScriptBody: if GetCount() == 0 then MoveTo(0, 1- 1/2) ResizeTo(1, 1/2) elsif GetCount() == 1 then MoveTo(0, 1 - 1/3) ResizeTo(1, 1/3) elsif GetCount() == 2 then MoveTo(0, 1 - 2/3) ResizeTo(1, 2/3) ResetCount() endif

OpeWinSettings.Name: UpLeft
OpeWinSettings.ScriptBody: if GetCount() == 0 then MoveTo(0, 0) ResizeTo(1/2, 1/2) elsif GetCount() == 1 then MoveTo(0, 0) ResizeTo(1/3, 1/3) elsif GetCount() == 2 then MoveTo(0, 0) ResizeTo(2/3, 2/3) ResetCount() endif

OpeWinSettings.Name: UpRight
OpeWinSettings.ScriptBody: if GetCount() == 0 then MoveTo(1 - 1/2, 0) ResizeTo(1/2, 1/2) elsif GetCount() == 1 then MoveTo(1 - 1/3, 0) ResizeTo(1/3, 1/3) elsif GetCount() == 2 then MoveTo(1 - 2/3, 0) ResizeTo(2/3, 2/3) ResetCount() endif

OpeWinSettings.Name: DownLeft
OpeWinSettings.ScriptBody: if GetCount() == 0 then MoveTo(0, 1 - 1/2) ResizeTo(1/2, 1/2) elsif GetCount() == 1 then MoveTo(0, 1 - 1/3) ResizeTo(1/3, 1/3) elsif GetCount() == 2 then MoveTo(0, 1 - 2/3) ResizeTo(2/3, 2/3) ResetCount() endif

OpeWinSettings.Name: DownRight
OpeWinSettings.ScriptBody: if GetCount() == 0 then MoveTo(1 - 1/2, 1 - 1/2) ResizeTo(1/2, 1/2) elsif GetCount() == 1 then MoveTo(1 - 1/3, 1 - 1/3) ResizeTo(1/3, 1/3) elsif GetCount() == 2 then MoveTo(1 - 2/3, 1 - 2/3) ResizeTo(2/3, 2/3) ResetCount() endif

OpeWinSettings.Name: Maximize-Restore
OpeWinSettings.ScriptBody: if GetCount() == 0 then Maximize() elsif GetCount() == 1 then Restore() ResetCount() endif

OpeWinSettings.Name: Left Up Combo
OpeWinSettings.ScriptBody: if GetCount() == 0 then ResizeTo(-1, 2/3) elsif GetCount() == 1 then ResizeTo(-1, 1/2) elsif GetCount() == 2 then ResizeTo(-1, 1/3) elsif GetCount() == 3 then ResizeTo(-1, 1) ResetCount() endif

OpeWinSettings.Name: Right Up Combo
OpeWinSettings.ScriptBody: if GetCount() == 0 then ResizeTo(-1, 2/3) elsif GetCount() == 1 then ResizeTo(-1, 1/2) elsif GetCount() == 2 then ResizeTo(-1, 1/3) elsif GetCount() == 3 then ResizeTo(-1, 1) ResetCount() endif

OpeWinSettings.Name: Left Down Combo
OpeWinSettings.ScriptBody: if GeCount() == 0 then MoveTo(-1, 1-2/3) ResizeTo(-1, 2/3) elsif GetCount() == 1 then MoveTo(-1, 1-1/2) ResizeTo(-1, 1/2) elsif GetCount() == 2 then MoveTo(-1, 1-1/3) ResizeTo(-1, 1/3) elsif GetCount() == 3 then MoveTo(-1, 0) ResizeTo(-1, 1) ResetCount() endif

OpeWinSettings.Name: Right Down Combo
OpeWinSettings.ScriptBody: if Count == 0 then MoveTo(-1, 1-2/3) ResizeTo(-1, 2/3) elsif GetCount() == 1 then MoveTo(-1, 1-1/2) ResizeTo(-1, 1/2) elsif GetCount() == 2 then MoveTo(-1, 1-1/3) ResizeTo(-1, 1/3) elsif GetCount() == 3 then MoveTo(-1, 0) ResizeTo(-1, 1) ResetCount() endif

OpeWinSettings.Name: Up Left Combo
OpeWinSettings.ScriptBody: if GetCount() == 0 then ResizeTo(2/3, -1) elsif GetCount() == 1 then ResizeTo(1/2, -1) elsif GetCount() == 2 then ResizeTo(1/3, -1) elsif GetCount() == 3 then ResizeTo(1, -1) ResetCount() endif

OpeWinSettings.Name: Up Right Combo
OpeWinSettings.ScriptBody: if GetCount() == 0 then MoveTo(1-2/3,-1) ResizeTo(2/3, -1) elsif GetCount() == 1 then MoveTo(1-1/2,-1) ResizeTo(1/2, -1) elsif GetCount() == 2 then MoveTo(1-1/3,-1) ResizeTo(1/3, -1) elsif GetCount() == 3 then MoveTo(0,-1) ResizeTo(1, -1) ResetCount() endif

OpeWinSettings.Name: Down Left Combo
OpeWinSettings.ScriptBody: if GetCount() == 0 then ResizeTo(2/3, -1) elsif GetCount() == 1 then ResizeTo(1/2, -1) elsif GetCount() == 2 then ResizeTo(1/3, -1) elsif GetCount() == 3 then ResizeTo(1, -1) ResetCount() endif

OpeWinSettings.Name: Down Right Combo
OpeWinSettings.ScriptBody: if GetCount() == 0 then MoveTo(1-2/3,-1) ResizeTo(2/3, -1) elsif GetCount() == 1 then MoveTo(1-1/2,-1) ResizeTo(1/2, -1) elsif GetCount() == 2 then MoveTo(1-1/3,-1) ResizeTo(1/3, -1) elsif GetCount() == 3 then MoveTo(0,-1) ResizeTo(1, -1) ResetCount() endif
